title: Introduction to Gazebo Simulation for Robotics
description: Simulation is an indispensable tool in modern robotics development. It allows us to test algorithms, design controllers, and train AI models in a safe, cost-effective, and repeatable virtual environment before deploying them on physical hardware. Gazebo is a powerful, open-source 3D robotics simulator that is widely used in both research and industry.
